str2: A primary particle of emphasis or qualification.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Management of household affairs, stewardship, administration. From oikonomos; administration; specially, a 'economy'.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
